name: Le Petit Pot | Delivery App
description:
Le Petit Pot is a cake delivery app built by Fatec Students from the UX class.

The purpouse was show the main principles of user centered design (UCD).

The full project you can see in: https://www.behance.net/gallery/124523783/Le-Petit-Pot-UX-Project (Portuguese version)

Moreover, the brand and the marketing were also built. You can check this out in: https://www.behance.net/gallery/124528061/Le-Petit-Pot-Marketing-Digital (Portuguese version)
